original_title: 稲川淳二の超こわい話 赤い部屋
overview: The latest in the summer classic "Junji Inagawa's Super Scary Stories" series!  Junji Inagawa's increasingly polished ghost stories will send shivers down your spine!  The door to the Red Room/Blue Room of Fear has already been opened. Come on, let's go together. ......
title: The Most Fearful Stories by Junji Inagawa: Red Room
